rows.label: tlk70000055_05_msg0001
rows.name:
I was so worried about how down
Noel was that I tried talking to him
about it in the end.

rows.label: tlk70000055_05_msg0002
rows.name:
Seems like he realized how dispirited
he'd been in the attack, and that made
him feel even more down on himself.

rows.label: tlk70000055_05_msg0003
rows.name:
I gave him a good hard dose of truth.
I said he was gloomy from the start and
that didn't stop us becoming friends.

rows.label: tlk70000055_05_msg0004
rows.name:
I expected him to start crying then and
there. I really thought I'd put my foot in
my mouth again, like always...

rows.label: tlk70000055_05_msg0005
rows.name:
But actually, he thanked me for being
honest with him! He did cry, though.
A lot.

rows.label: tlk70000055_05_msg0006
rows.name:
Then I started crying, too, and the
waterworks just wouldn't stop.
Makes you laugh now, doesn't it?

rows.label: tlk70000055_05_msg0007
rows.name:
I'm really glad I was able to talk to him.
It made me realize that nothing
happens if you don't make the effort.
